title: 『Time』一周摄影图片精选：October 1 －14，2011
content:
链接： 《Times》新闻摄影图片精选 新闻摄影@Leica.org.cn

Friday, October 14, 2011
一名佛教徒抱着刚被替换下的旧旗帜，加德满都，尼泊尔。摄影师：Navesh Chitrakar
A Buddhist carries old prayer flags to be replaced with new ones at Swayambhunath Stupa in Kathmandu, Nepal.

Wednesday, October 12, 2011
叙利亚政权支持者举起国旗以支持总统Bashar Assad，大马士革，叙利亚。摄影师：Muzaffar Salman
Syrian regime supporters wave the Baath party flag during a demonstration to show their support for President Bashar Assad.

Wednesday, October 12, 2011
一名不丹学生在搬运国王旺楚克与新王妃佩玛的合影照片，这张合影将被挂在学校门口。摄影师：Kevin Frayer
A Bhutanese student carries a portrait of King Jigme Khesar Namgyal Wangchuck and future Queen Jetsun Pema.

Sunday, October 9, 2011
一名天主教修女在填写自己的投票，波兰。摄影师：Agencja Gazeta
A Catholic nun casts her vote at a polling station in Krakow, Poland.

Friday, October 7, 2011
在与卡扎菲残余势力的冲突中，一名利比亚革命军士兵冲出掩体。摄影师：Manu Brabo
A Libyan revolutionary fighter runs for cover while attacking pro-Gaddafi forces in Sirt, Libya.

Saturday, October 1, 2011
中国少数民族演员在进行表演，漓江，云南。摄影师：Stringer
Chinese ethnic minority performers carry baskets on their backs as they perform in a play in Lijiang, Yunnan province.

Wednesday, October 5, 2011
黎明前，一座朝鲜政府大楼上金日成的照片，平壤。摄影师：Damir Sagoli
A portrait of Kim Il Sung, founder of the communist regime in North Korea, beams from a government building at 6 a.m.
